topic.title: Number of MC Overlays

body.p: This field defines the number of Multicast Overlays supported in the port. Note that at least 1 MC Overlay is allocated internally per port to maintain compatibility with the PCIe specification, regardless of this field's value. If the Multicast Overlay Scheme is set to Static then the maximum number of Multicast overlays that can be statically configured is 6. Otherwise, the maximum number of MC overlays is 64 per stack. e.g. If this field is configured to be 48 in port 0 of stack 0, the overlay number that can be configured in other ports of stack 0 are 64-48 = 16.
